duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurate and timely processing of Medicare enrollment transactions using payer-specific policies and procedures
Managing the Enrollment Analyst staff and assisting in managing high-priority enrollment issues
Interacting with client organizations to help run a high-quality Enrollment operation
Advising on complex flagged or other TRCs based on approved desk-level procedures and resolving pended enrollment records
Collaborating on special projects as assigned by the Medicare Enrollment and Billing Director
Developing knowledge of CMS Manual, Chapter 2, Enrollment and Disenrollment Sections 30 and 40 terms, terminology, and concepts of election periods, enrollment, and disenrollment
Reviewing enrollment audit findings and implementing process improvement initiatives and skills enhancement training

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree required with 6+ years of relevant professional Medicare Advantage Enrollment operations for an insurance company or healthcare payor, with 3 years of progressive supervisory responsibilities. Willingness to learn new skills and succeed in a new career.
